name: Verify rate validation of agency when making new booking - Client User
folder: UNO196, UNO1472 Bookings- Create new Booking- Agencies- Validate date and show only new Rate based on date of the Booking
objective: When making a new booking when client choose agency, rate showed against agency should be valid date based on the date of booking.
testScript: {"step":[{"$":{"index":"0"},"customFields":"","description":"Log in as Client User","expectedResult":"Successful log in and user in homepage"},{"$":{"index":"1"},"customFields":"","description":"Navigate to booking request and manage bookings","expectedResult":"User in bookings page"},{"$":{"index":"2"},"customFields":"","description":"Select Client Location and click new booking","expectedResult":"User taken to new booking window"},{"$":{"index":"3"},"customFields":"","description":"Make a dummy booking and select agency from the agency tab","expectedResult":"Based on start and end date of the booking in agency tab, user should see only rates that are effective for that date."},{"$":{"index":"4"},"customFields":"","description":"Click save and send","expectedResult":"User able to make successful booking"},{"$":{"index":"5"},"customFields":"","description":"Verify details of the booking as agency","expectedResult":"All details should match with booking made by client"},{"$":{"index":"6"},"customFields":"","description":"Repeat step 1 to 6 in ME and Firefox Browser","expectedResult":"All expected results should be achieved"}]}

name: Verify Dashboard functionality as Neuven User
folder: UNO205, UNO1172 Neuven User- Dashboard options
objective: User should be able to see dashboard and when clicked on each graph, User should be able to see the data that sits behind the graph
testScript:
{"step":[{"$":{"index":"0"},"customFields":"","description":"Log in as Neuven User","expectedResult":"Login successful and User is in homepage","testData":"adhi.bommanapally@neuven.co.uk
Welcome.1"},{"$":{"index":"1"},"customFields":"","description":"From homepage Navigate to Home and select dashboard from dropdown","expectedResult":"User should be able to see the dashboard setup page"},{"$":{"index":"2"},"customFields":"","description":"From Dropdown choose client","expectedResult":"User should be able to see all dashboard charts for that client"},{"$":{"index":"3"},"customFields":"","description":"Click on each chart","expectedResult":"User should be able to see the data table for that chart"},{"$":{"index":"4"},"customFields":"","description":"Repeat step 1 to 4 in ME and firefox browser","expectedResult":"All expected results should be achieved"}]}

name: Verify Rate export as Neuven User
folder: UNO293, UNO1485 Rate export- filtered results
testScript: {"step":[{"$":{"index":"0"},"customFields":"","description":"Login to Venneu-dev.com as a neuven user","expectedResult":"Log in successful and user in homepage"},{"$":{"index":"1"},"customFields":"","description":"Navigate to Rates and Rates export","expectedResult":"User taken to rate export page"},{"$":{"index":"2"},"customFields":"","description":"Choose client form the drop down or select all","expectedResult":"User should be able to see list of different rates according to selection made"},{"$":{"index":"3"},"customFields":"","description":"Click export icon in the right corner","expectedResult":"Rates xlsx file should be downloaded"},{"$":{"index":"4"},"customFields":"","description":"Filter data using the search icon on the screen","expectedResult":"Data shown on the screen should be filtered down based on the key words used"},{"$":{"index":"5"},"customFields":"","description":"Click export to excel after filtering data","expectedResult":"Data on exported excel file should correspond and match with the data on the page"},{"$":{"index":"6"},"customFields":"","description":"Repeat step 1 to 6 firefox browser","expectedResult":"All expected results should match"},{"$":{"index":"7"},"customFields":"","description":"Repeat step 1 to 6 edge browser","expectedResult":"All expected results should match"}]}

name: Verify Rate export as Client User
folder: UNO293, UNO1485 Rate export- filtered results
testScript: {"step":[{"$":{"index":"0"},"customFields":"","description":"Login to Venneu-dev.com as a Client User","expectedResult":"Log in successful and user in homepage"},{"$":{"index":"1"},"customFields":"","description":"Navigate to Rates export","expectedResult":"User taken to rate export page and should be able to see list of all rates"},{"$":{"index":"2"},"customFields":"","description":"Click export icon in the right corner","expectedResult":"Rates xlsx file should be downloaded"},{"$":{"index":"3"},"customFields":"","description":"Check the data on the xlsx file","expectedResult":"Data should correspond and match with the data on the page"},{"$":{"index":"4"},"customFields":"","description":"Filter data on the screen using the search icon","expectedResult":"Data should be filtered according to the key words used"},{"$":{"index":"5"},"customFields":"","description":"Click export to excel after filtering Data","expectedResult":"Data on the exported excel file should match with the filtered data on the screen"},{"$":{"index":"6"},"customFields":"","description":"Repeat step 1 to 6 firefox browser","expectedResult":"All expected results should match"},{"$":{"index":"7"},"customFields":"","description":"Repeat step 1 to 6 edge browser","expectedResult":"All expected results should match"}]}

name: Verify filters in the Authorize Rate Adjustments page
objective: User should be able to filter the data on the Authorize rate adjustment page using advance filter options and the system should not throw an AJAX error while using the filters.
testScript:
{"step":[{"$":{"index":"0"},"customFields":"","description":"Log in as neuven user in www.venneu-dev.com","expectedResult":"Successful log in and User should see the Home page","testData":"Adhi.bommanapally@neuven.co.uk
Welcome.1"},{"$":{"index":"1"},"customFields":"","description":"From home page navigate to rates on the left panel and choose Authorise Rate adjustments from the drop down","expectedResult":"User should be taken to Authorize rate adjustment page and also should be able to see the list of all the adjusted rates that are waiting to be authorised"},{"$":{"index":"2"},"customFields":"","description":"Click on the search Icon on the right corner","expectedResult":"User should be able to see the individual search boxes above each column"},{"$":{"index":"3"},"customFields":"","description":"Filter data by entering values in the search boxes individually","expectedResult":"Data shown should be filtered and shown to the user based on the key words in the search box"},{"$":{"index":"4"},"customFields":"","description":"Verify by filtering data by entering values in multiple search boxes.","expectedResult":"Data should be filtered according to multiple filters that are used"},{"$":{"index":"5"},"customFields":"","description":"Verify by adding values to all the search boxes","expectedResult":"Data should still correspond based on the data entered."},{"$":{"index":"6"},"customFields":"","description":"Export the filtered data by clicking on the export icon on the right corner","expectedResult":"Data on the exported file should match and correspond to the data shown on the screen after filtering"},{"$":{"index":"7"},"customFields":"","description":"Repeat Steps 1 to 7 in IE and firefox browser","expectedResult":"All expected results should be achieved"}]}

name: Verify the Cancel functionality in Rate Creation Page
folder: UNO293 UNO1459 Cancel Button on Rate Creation Window
objective: While creating a New Rate the user should be able to use the Cancel button to cancel the rate creation using the cancel button. By hitting the cancel button User should be able to reset the rate creation page and erase any fields that were previously filled
testScript:
{"step":[{"$":{"index":"0"},"customFields":"","description":"Log in a neuven User in www.venneu-dev.com","expectedResult":"User logged in successfully and landed in Home Page","testData":"adhi.bommanapally@neuven.co.uk
Welcome.1"},{"$":{"index":"1"},"customFields":"","description":"From Home page Navigate to Rates and choose rate creation from the dropdown","expectedResult":"User see rate creation window and a table of all existing rates at the bottom of that window"},{"$":{"index":"2"},"customFields":"","description":"Create a rate filling in all the fields","expectedResult":"User should be able to enter all the details successfully"},{"$":{"index":"3"},"customFields":"","description":"Click on cancel at the bottom of the window","expectedResult":"User should see all the fields been reset and there is no previously filled details on the rate creation window."},{"$":{"index":"4"},"customFields":"","description":"Fill only few fields and then click cancel","expectedResult":"User should see a fresh rate creation window with all the fields reset"},{"$":{"index":"5"},"customFields":"","description":"
Verify by clicking the cancel before entering any details","expectedResult":"User should still stay on the rate creation page with empty fields to create a new rate"},{"$":{"index":"6"},"customFields":"","description":"verify by clicking cancel multiple times","expectedResult":"User should still stay on the rate creation page with empty fields to create a new rate"},{"$":{"index":"7"},"customFields":"","description":"Repeat step 1 to 7 in ME and Firefox browser","expectedResult":"All expected results should be achieved"}]}

name: Verify if deleting booking feature is inactive for Completed bookings as Neuven User
folder: UNO196 UNO1436 Delete booking option removed for completed bookings
objective: User should not be able to delete a booking which has status as completed.
testScript:
{"step":[{"$":{"index":"0"},"customFields":"","description":"Log in as Neuven User in www.venneu-dev.com","expectedResult":"Login successful and user in homepage","testData":"adhi.bommanapally@neuven.co.uk
Welcome.1"},{"$":{"index":"1"},"customFields":"","description":"Navigate to bookings and choose Manage Bookings from dropdown","expectedResult":"User should navigate to bookings page"},{"$":{"index":"2"},"customFields":"","description":"Find a booking that is completed    ","expectedResult":"User should be able to see the list view of that day with the filtered booking reference","testData":"Date 11/06/2022 Booking Ref: 692"},{"$":{"index":"3"},"customFields":"","description":"Navigate to the delete icon at the right corner of the booking","expectedResult":"The delete Icon should be inactive when the  status is completed"},{"$":{"index":"4"},"customFields":"","description":"Click on edit booking icon","expectedResult":"Edit booking window opens"},{"$":{"index":"5"},"customFields":"","description":"Check for the delete button at the bottom. ","expectedResult":"The delete button at the bottom should not appear or should be inactive and the user should not be able to delete the booking."},{"$":{"index":"6"},"customFields":"","description":"Click on the edit booking icon of the completed booking and make changes to the booking. Eg Increase number of workers requested and then click on update booking","expectedResult":"Booking should be edited and status changed back to Pending"},{"$":{"index":"7"},"customFields":"","description":"Navigate to delete Icon on the right corner of the booking","expectedResult":"Delete icon should be active as the status is changed back to pending."},{"$":{"index":"8"},"customFields":"","description":"Repeat steps 1 to 6 in ME and Firefox Browser","expectedResult":"All expected results should be achieved"}]}

name: Verify if deleting booking feature is inactive for Completed bookings as Client User
folder: UNO196 UNO1436 Delete booking option removed for completed bookings
objective: User should not be able to delete a booking which has status as completed.
testScript: {"step":[{"$":{"index":"0"},"customFields":"","description":"Log in as Client User in www.venneu-dev.com","expectedResult":"Login successful and user in homepage","testData":""},{"$":{"index":"1"},"customFields":"","description":"Navigate to bookings and choose Manage Bookings from dropdown","expectedResult":"User should navigate to bookings page"},{"$":{"index":"2"},"customFields":"","description":"Find a booking that is completed    ","expectedResult":"User should be able to see the list view of that day with the filtered booking reference","testData":"Date 11/06/2022 Booking Ref: 692"},{"$":{"index":"3"},"customFields":"","description":"Navigate to the delete icon at the right corner of the booking","expectedResult":"The delete Icon should be inactive when the  status is completed"},{"$":{"index":"4"},"customFields":"","description":"Click on edit booking icon","expectedResult":"Edit booking window opens"},{"$":{"index":"5"},"customFields":"","description":"Check for the delete button at the bottom. ","expectedResult":"The delete button at the bottom should not appear or should be inactive and the user should not be able to delete the booking."},{"$":{"index":"6"},"customFields":"","description":"Click on the edit booking icon of the completed booking and make changes to the booking. Eg Increase number of workers requested and then click on update booking","expectedResult":"Booking should be updated and the status should change back to pending"},{"$":{"index":"7"},"customFields":"","description":"Navigate to the delete icon on the right corner of the booking","expectedResult":"Delete Icon should be activated again because of the status change of the booking"},{"$":{"index":"8"},"customFields":"","description":"Repeat steps 1 to 8 in ME and Firefox Browser","expectedResult":"All expected results should be achieved"}]}

name: Verify Client Invoice CSV Date format and Worker EMP Data as Neuven User
folder: UNO201 UNO1430 Date format and Worker EMP details Client invoice CSV
objective: To verify the client Invoice CSV and make sure Invoice date is not in US format and Worker EMP column has relevant data present in it.
testScript: {"step":[{"$":{"index":"0"},"customFields":"","description":"Log in as Neuven User in www.Venneu-dev.com","expectedResult":"Log in Successful and User in Home page","testData":"adhi.bommanapally@neuven.co.uk Welcome.1"},{"$":{"index":"1"},"customFields":"","description":"From Home page Navigate to Client and then choose Client invoices from dropdown","expectedResult":"User navigates to Client invoices Page and should be able to see list of invoices for all clients"},{"$":{"index":"2"},"customFields":"","description":"Choose and view any invoice from the list ","expectedResult":"User should be able to see the invoice details in a separate page"},{"$":{"index":"3"},"customFields":"","description":"At the bottom of the page click on Export to CSV","expectedResult":"All the details behind the invoice calculation will be downloaded as a CSV file"},{"$":{"index":"4"},"customFields":"","description":"Open the Excel file from downloads","expectedResult":"User should be able to see all the details related to the invoice in the Excel Sheet"},{"$":{"index":"5"},"customFields":"","description":"Verify Date format in the Invoice date column","expectedResult":"Date format in the invoice date column should be UK format."},{"$":{"index":"6"},"customFields":"","description":"Verify the Worker EMP status column","expectedResult":"This column should contain relevant data and should not be empty."},{"$":{"index":"7"},"customFields":"","description":"Repeat steps 1 to 7 in ME and firefox Browser","expectedResult":"All expected results should be achieved"}]}

name: Verify that the generic search function works with special characters.
testScript:
Given :
  • Logged on as an agency user with relevant permissions.
When :
  • One the booking request > manager requests page. 
Then :
  • User should be able to search in the generic search field using special characters.
  • Search can include date format :'xx/xx/xxxx'.

name: Verify that the total and generic search function work when searching for values in the total column of the table.
folder: Bug Tickets/UNO-2003 Search Function on the create view adjustments page
testScript:
Given :
  • Logged on as a client user with create / view adjustments permissions 
Then :
  • On the create view adjustments page. 
When :
  • The user should be able to search the total column values in the above specific search function.
  • and also in the advance generic search function.

name: Verify that an agency worker (Vennue) cant view the reports submenu on the side navigation.
testScript:
Given :
  •  Logged in as and agency user
When :
  • Viewing the side navigation bar on the website. 
Then :
  • The user should not see an option for the reports page.

name: UNO2072  , UNO 2074 Verify the Authorization Step Addition
testScript:
Given :
  • Logged in as user with 'approve booking' permissions, 
When :
  • The user has approved the booking. 
Then :
  • The booking need to be authorized before it can be sent to the client .

name: UNO2072, UNO 2075 Verify The  User Permissions for Authorization -  user has permissions
testScript:
Given :
  • Logged on as a user with  the authorize bookings permission.
When :
  • Authorizing bookings 
Then :
  • User is allowed to authorize the approved bookings.

name: UNO2072, UNO 2075 Verify The  User Permissions for Authorization -  user Does NOT have permissions.
testScript:
Given :
  • Logged on as a user without  the 'authorize bookings' permission.
When :
  • Authorizing bookings 
Then :
  • User is NOT allowed to authorize the approved bookings.

name: UNO2072  , UNO 2074 Verify the Authorization Step Addition - User does Not have permission
testScript:
Given :
  • Logged in as user without 'approve booking' permissions, 
When :
  • On the booking page 
Then :
  • The user is not able to authorize the booking or action it.

name: UNO2072,  UNO 2076 - Verify the booking process following authorization.
testScript:
Given :
  • Logged on a a user with Approve bookings permission 
When :
  • The booking has been approved 
Then :
  • The booking should be sent to the client for action as normal 
  • The rest of the steps are unchanged.

name: UNO2072, UNO2077 Verify that the status of the booking updates / reflexes its current status.
testScript:
Given :
  • Logged on as a user with authorize bookings permissions 
When :
  • Creating a booking and and approving, authorizing and completing the life cycle of the booking 
Then :
  • The status of the booking on the booking management page reflects the current status of the booking throughout the process.

name: UNO2072, Uno2078 Verify edit restriction on completed bookings.
testScript:
Given :
  • When logged on as a user with authorize bookings permissions.
When :
  • On the booking request > manage bookings > complete page.
  • Select a completed booking.
Then :
  • Only the number of workers can be increased or decreased,
  • This sets the booking back to pending status.
